summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3642 , for the improvement of North 34th Street, from west margin of Evanston Avenue to east margin of Fremont Avenue and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44975 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
